entry.title: Dual control cars and incidents on driving tests
entry.content: The number of incidents that have happened on driving tests over the last 5 years in cars that were not fitted with dual controls.

entry.title: EU third directive information - driving test examiner training requirements
entry.content: Minutes of all meetings containing information on the EU Third Directive concerning driving test examiner training requirements.

entry.title: Motorcycle practical riding test statistics by sub-category
entry.content: Information about motorcycle test statistics, broken down by sub-category A, A1 and A2 and month.

entry.title: Category C, C1 and C+E practical driving tests passed and failed
entry.content: Number of C, C1 and C+E tests passed and failed for each of the financial years from 2005 to 2010.

entry.title: Car practical driving test cancellations for 2010
entry.content: The number of car practical tests applied for, number of tests cancelled and the reason for cancellation for the 2010 calendar year.

entry.title: Motorcycle module 1 practical riding test incidents for 2009 to 2010
entry.content: The number of incidents that occurred on the module 1 motorcycle test broken down by month and category for the financial year 2009 to 2010.

entry.title: Operational driving test centre closures
entry.content: Information about car driving test centres that DSA is scheduled to close up until 6 April 2016.

entry.title: Approved driving instructors on the register by grade
entry.content: The number of approved driving instructors (ADIs) on the register split by grade, as of 1 March 2011.

entry.title: Large goods vehicle and Driver CPC statistics
entry.content: Information on large goods vehicle and Driver Certificate of Professional Competence statistics.

entry.title: Driving test cancellations at Gosforth from 29 November to 24 December 2010
entry.content: Information on driving test cancellations at Gosforth large goods vehicle test centre from 29 November to 24 December 2010.
